thread.title_full: Grand Designs - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Paul R
title: Grand Designs
text:
Spectacular hotels abound in this wonderful corner of Paris so calling urself "The Grand" might be setting urself up to fail. Fear not - this hotel is really special. For starters the building is a national monument - Napoleon and Josephine used to dance in its ballroom. So the bar is set high - and remains consistently so throughout. Staff are friendly, courteous and efficient. Rooms v well presented (if funds permit get club room access - excellent facilities throughout the day). The Cafe de la
Paix restaurant is a great place to eat, especially after a performance at the Palais Garnier just across the road. Great metro and bus (including hop on hop off bus) connections right on ur doorstep. All in all a great and uplifting place to stay and explore the city of light.
